input.sentences: i love taking photos of an older neighborhood .
i often wonder about the history of a specific home .
like who lived here | how many children grew up here | etc .
this house looks like it has some history !
maybe the town doctor lived in this house .
output.sentences: A light, powdery snow blanketed the village.
With space at a premium, most homes were two or three stories tall.
fifty years ago, television antennas would have been perched on the roofs.
Many homes have two or three chimneys, showing how the homes were heated when first built.
The old church, like most other buildings, had changed little over the years.
